title: U.K. Economy Shrinks as Threat of Recession Nears
description: Britainâ€™s economic output fell in the third quarter and European Union officials forecast weakening growth for countries across the continent.

media:description: Britain saw its highest annual rate of inflation in 40 years in September, and prices are expected to rise even more before peaking.
